New Records: Rohit Sharma is set to surpass 500 runs in T20Is against Bangladesh
Pre-Game Insights: India is riding high on a 47-run victory over AFG and a 12/1 head-to-head record against Bangladesh.
Rohit Sharma and Yuzvendra Chahal are leading the charge for India.
Bangladesh enters with key players Towhid Hridoy and Mustafizur Rahman in focus.
The match is a testing batting track at Sir Vivian Richards Stadium.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is a high-stakes Asian derby with implications for reaching the semis.
The fixture is scheduled for Saturday, June 22, 2024, at 8 pm IST.
